pages.text: The $(mob)Mooshroom$() is the only animal that spawns in $(thing)Mushroom Fields$(). It is very similar to a normal $(l:minecraft_cow)$(mob)Cow$(), dropping the same items, giving $(item)Milk$() and being breedable with $(item)Wheat$().$(p)However, it can also be milked with a $(item)Bowl$() to give $(item)Mushroom Stew$(), or sheared with $(item)Shears$() to give $(item)Mushrooms$(), permanently turning it in to a $(l:minecraft_cow)$(mob)Cow$().
